text: you are not gonna believe what I'm
making today I'm making a broccoli and
cheddar cheese soup huh
what do you think about that this one
also has mushrooms in it which is
completely up to you if you don't like
mushrooms you can leave them out but I
love the depth of flavor that you get
when you add mushrooms so I am putting
them in to start off with slice up your
mushrooms this is about a half a pound
of mushrooms or about three and a half
cups sliced mushrooms if you buy your
mushrooms sliced now the recipe doesn't
say to but I actually like to saute my
mushrooms a little bit before I add my
liquid this is four tablespoons of
unsalted butter melt it in the medium
saucepan and add your mushrooms now you
can add two cloves of garlic that have
been minced get that fragrant just a
little bit cook it until it smells
delicious 6 tablespoons of all-purpose
flour stir the flour around it's going
to get very thick and coat your
mushrooms now you can add your broth
the 1/2 a cup at first of chicken broth
this is just to start the thickening
process off without getting it lumpy
it's 2 cups of total chicken broth and
then on top of that two and a half cups
of water you want to bring this mixture
to a boil and then simmer it until the
mushrooms are tender and the liquid is
thicken about 20 minutes so now that
it's cooked down you can add your
broccoli I have about two cups of small
broccoli florets you want to simmer
these until they're tender that'll just
take a couple of minutes
broccoli is bright green and tender so I
turn the heat off and I'm stirring in
one cup of cheddar cheese and then you
let it melt and then another cop rest of
the cheese this is kind of ridiculous
you guys look at that creamy as can be a
little salt and some pepper
I think that's fantastic and it's done
you're not gonna believe this I think a
hunk of bread would be fantastic with
this or even some crostini would be
great but of course fantastic on its own
mmm well Molly it's fantastic
